## A typical week


::: {.fragment .top-space}
**Monday--Thursday**<br> work through chapters
:::

::: {.fragment .top-space}
**Wednesday**<br> in-person lecture and workshop
:::

::: {.fragment .top-space}
**Friday**<br> write and submit code for weekly practice exercise
:::


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


## Week by week

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment}
#### First half of term

| Week | Topic                    |
|-----:|:-------------------------|
| 1    | Getting started          |
| 2    | Wrangling data           |
| 3    | Mapping crime patterns   |
| 4    | Adding context to maps   |
| 5    | **Assessment 1**         |
:::

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment}
#### Second half of term

| Week | Topic                    |
|-----:|:-------------------------|
| 6    | Using area data          |
| 7    | Mapping hotspots         |
| 8    | Mapping crime series     |
| 9    | Mapping change over time |
| 10   | **Assessment 2**         |
:::

::::

::: {.fragment .top-space}
**After Easter**: final assessment
:::


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


## Module assessment

|     | Weight | Deadline                 | You will produce …           |
|----:|:-------|:-------------------------|:-----------------------------|
| 1   | 20%    | Wed 12 February (Week 5) | code to make 3 maps          |
| 2   | 20%    | Wed 26 March (Week 10)   | code to make a short report  |
| 3   | 60%    | Thu 24 April (Term 3)    | code to make a longer report |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


## How to do well

::: {.fragment .top-space}
**Manage your time**<br> don't try to finish everything in the in-person session
:::

::: {.fragment .top-space}
**Complete all the activities**<br> lectures only cover part of what you need to know
:::

::: {.fragment .top-space}
**Ask lots of questions**<br> easier to do in person than on Moodle
:::

::: {.fragment .top-space}
**Practice**<br> submit each week's exercise before Friday @ 4pm
:::
